page.title: 03HETTON FURNITURE DISTRIB.
page.content: Hetton Furniture Distributors was originally called Vardys. It was founded over 40 years ago. It started with a horse and cart delivering coal, then 10 years ago it developed into a {transport business.}It had fleet of tipper lorries and used to move coal from the colleries to the power station. It was then changed to become a furniture business delivering new furniture from factories to shops. Instead of carrying other peoples furniture they decided to import furniture and to sell to the shops themselves. They now{import}furniture from Germany, Hungary, Denmark and Israel, their main import being {bedroom furniture}from West Germany. There main customers are the House of Fraser, Waring and Gillow and Wades and Courts. They now have 15 agents up and down the country.
